entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming southeast 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
